images.name: LEMP
images.notes: LEMP Stack powered with Nginx, PHP and MySQL. Supports WordPress, Laravel, CodeIgniter etc

images.name: LAMP
images.notes: LAMP Stack powered with Apache2, PHP and MySQL. Supports WordPress, Laravel, CodeIgniter etc

images.name: Phalcon
images.notes: Phalcon is a PHP web framework based on the model–view–controller pattern. Originally released in 2012, it is an open-source framework licensed under the terms of the BSD License.

images.name: WordPress
images.notes: WordPress is a free and open-source content management system written in PHP and paired with a MySQL or MariaDB database. Features include a plugin architecture and a template system, referred to within WordPress as Themes.

images.name: Ghost
images.notes: Ghost is a free and open source blogging platform written in JavaScript and distributed under the MIT License, designed to simplify the process of online publishing for individual bloggers as well as online publications.

images.name: Apache_PHP
images.notes: Basic PHP stack running on Apache2 and php-fpm

images.name: Nginx_PHP
images.notes: Basic PHP stack running on Nginx and php-fpm

images.name: Caddy
images.notes: Caddy 2 is a powerful, enterprise-ready, open source web server with automatic HTTPS written in Go

images.name: Adminer
images.notes: Database management in a single PHP file

images.name: Confluence
images.notes: Confluence is your team workspace where knowledge and collaboration meet to achieve great things.

images.name: Portainer
images.notes: Build and manage your Docker environments with ease.

images.name: Gitlab
images.notes: Build and manage your Docker environments with ease.
